channel.title: audit on Sparking Mind
channel.description: Recent content in audit on Sparking Mind

item.title: audit command cheatsheet
item.description: Audit Cheatsheet audit syscall auditctl -a exit,always -S <syscall> audit file auditctl -w /etc/shadow -p wa extra option Tag Description -b backlog Set max number of outstanding audit buffers allowed (Kernel Default=64) If all buffers are full, the failure flag is consulted by the kernel for action. -e [0..2] Set enabled flag. When 0 is passed, this can be used to temporarily disable auditing.
